welcome_message_body: Welcome to Aalsmeer, Netherlands! We hope you enjoy your stay in this charming city known for its beautiful flower market and waterways. Take some time to explore and immerse yourself in all that Aalsmeer has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly European and intercontinental flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly budget airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Soesterberg Air Base Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Soesterberg Air Base Airport is reserved for military personnel and their families.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rotterdam Zestienhoven Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rotterdam Zestienhoven Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
